channel.title: AMS Council Agenda Feed
channel.description: A feed that parses the agendas for AMS Council

item.title: AMS Council Agenda – February 26, 2025 at 6:00 PM
item.guid: AMS Council Agenda – February 26, 2025 at 6:00 PM
item.content:encoded:
AMS Council - February 26, 2025

Alma Mater Society of UBC Vancouver

Wednesday, February 26, 2025 at 6:00 PM PST to Wednesday, February 26, 2025 at

10:00 PM PST

Michael Kingsmill Forum + Zoom for Councillors (must be pre-arranged with the

President): https://ubc.zoom.us/j/61361551422?pwd=WDhIblhkNEVEcFIyT1lsMjhBc0tSQT09

Meeting Details: https://ubc.zoom.us/j/61361551422?pwd=WDhIblhkNEVEcFIyT1lsMjhBc0tSQT09

Agenda

I. Call to Order 6:00 PM

II. Territorial Acknowledgement 6:10 PM

III. Approval of the Agenda 6:12 PM

"BE IT RESOLVED THAT the agenda be accepted as presented."

IV. Membership and Attendance: Introductions, New Members, Declaration of Vacancies6:15 PM

A. New Members

B. Vacancies

GSS, Medicine, AUS

C. Goodbyes

V. Speaker's Business and Remarks 6:16 PM

VI. Statements from Students-at-Large 6:21 PM

Statement from student-at-large - 3 minutes

Response from Councillors - 3 minutes

Closing remarks from student-at-large - 1 minute

Up to three students at large may address Council.

VII. Approval of Minutes of Council and Committees

"BE IT RESOLVED THAT the following minutes be accepted as presented:

VIII. Consent Items

A. Consent Items Requiring a Simple Majority

B. Consent Items Requiring a Two-Thirds Majority

IX. Presentations and Accompanying Motions

A. Budget Reforecast & Variances

X. Executive and Committee Motions

A. Clarification to Fee Referendum Question

Note - this does will not alter the fee structure, it will allow us to put the chart on the ballot

and provide more detail on the fee/fund descriptions

XI. Constituency and Affiliate Motions

XII. Discussions and Consultation

XIII. President's Business and Remarks 6:42 PM

Presenter: C K

Updates - 5 minutes

Question period - maximum 3 questions

XIV. Executive Business and Remarks

A. VP Academic & University Affairs 6:47 PM

Presenter: Zarifa Nawar

Updates - 3 minutes

Question period - maximum 3 questions

B. VP Administration 6:50 PM

Presenter: Amy Liao (she/her/hers)

Updates - 3 minutes

Question period - maximum 3 questions

C. VP External Affairs 6:53 PM

See President Update

D. VP Finance 6:56 PM

Presenter: Amber Dhaliwal

Updates - 3 minutes

Question period - maximum 3 questions

E. Managing Director 6:59 PM

Presenter: Justin Lieu

Updates - 3 minutes

Question period - maximum 3 questions

F. Senior Manager Student Services 7:02 PM

Presenter: Kathleen Simpson

Updates - 3 minutes

Question period - maximum 3 questions

XV. Committee Reports (3 minutes each)

A. Advocacy Committee 7:05 PM

Presenter: Zarifa Nawar

Updates - 3 minutes

Question period - maximum 3 questions

B. Finance Committee 7:08 PM

Presenter: Amber Dhaliwal

Updates - 3 minutes

Question period - maximum 3 questions

C. Operations Committee 7:11 PM

Presenter: Amy Liao (she/her/hers)

Updates - 3 minutes

Question period - maximum 3 questions

D. Governance Committee 7:14 PM

Presenter: Eshana Bhangu

Updates - 3 minutes

Question period - maximum 3 questions

E. Human Resources Committee 7:17 PM

Presenter: Cameron Taylor

Updates - 3 minutes

Question period - maximum 3 questions

F. Student Life Committee 7:20 PM

Presenter: Cameron Taylor

Updates - 3 minutes

Question period - maximum 3 questions

G. Executive Performance and Accountability Committee (EPA) 7:23 PM

Presenter: Riley Huntley

Updates - 3 minutes

Question period - maximum 3 questions

H. Advisory Board 7:26 PM

Presenter: C K

Updates - 3 minutes

Question period - maximum 3 questions

XVI. Report from Presidents' Council 7:29 PM

Presenter: C K

Updates - 3 minutes

Question period - maximum 3 questions

XVII. Board of Governors, Senate, & Ombudsperson Reports

A. Board of Governors

Presenters: Eshana Bhangu, Kamil Kanji

B. Senate

Presenters: Jasper Lorien, Jacky Xue

C. Ombudsperson

XVIII. Historical Update 7:32 PM

Presenter: Sheldon Goldfarb

XIX. Other Business, Including In Camera Discussions, Notices of Motions and Submissions

A. In Camera Session

XX. Next Meeting and Adjournment

Next Council meeting time and date: 6:00 pm on March 12, 2025.

Supporting Documents
